column2: Designate [This.GetFullBaseName] as the recipient for future title transfers.\n
Title is not already designated as recipient
[From.GetBestName] has designated a title in [From.GetHerHis] realm which is not already the de-jure liege of [Root.GetBaseName].
Sets the designated recipient title of [From.GetBestName] to [Root.GetFullBaseName]
There is no de-jure owner of [Root.GetFullBaseName] not controlled by [From.GetBestName]
